summary: Conducted research on genetics and epigenetics of leukemia

- Conducted research on genetics and epigenetics of leukemia 
- Acquired fundamental skills for scientific research 
- Wrote several research articles and reviews published in reputable journals

- Performed bioinformatics analyses of various sequencing projects in the department 
- Implemented pipelines (mostly in bash) for the analysis of sequencing data
Management of biotechnology R+D projects both at national and international level.
